readable.title: 195962790_3380aea352
readable.content: A woman in a purple shirt and a brown puppy sit near a fountain A woman sits by the pool with a dog while another dog is nearby . A woman sits with her feet in a shallow pool and looks at a puppy . While the humans put their feet into the fountain , the puppy on the side with his master checks out the muzzle leash on the large rottweiler . Woman and dog cooling off at fountain
